title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the 'Open Project' menu item is available, but the 'Close Project' option is not.
EB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, either both 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' options should be available, or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Select both P1 and P2.
